name: Nigi3D
description:
Version Logs:

  1. niji3d V1: general 3D style, released.

  2. niji3d V2: add circular plinth, released (New!).

This model is inspired by https://civitai.com/models/25995/blindbox, but not limited to blindbox style. We train with diverse images and support more general 3D styles.

The tagger word is "<niji-se-3d>". We train on https://civitai.com/models/7371/rev-animated. For convenience, we provide our prompts for easy beginnings and you can try with some simple prompts such as "<niji-se-3d>, 1girl". Both pickle (.ckpt) and safetensors formats are provided.

It would be very appreciated if you could share with your interesting results and star our work. For any problem, feel free to ask in this post, we will reply ASAP. If you like other styles, also let us know.

meta.prompt: <niji-se-3d>, best quality, masterpiece, highres, 1girl,blush,(seductive smile:0.8),star-shaped pupils,china hanfu,hair ornament,necklace, jewelry,Beautiful face,upon_body, Chinese style
meta.negativePrompt: no face, half face, solo, (worst quality:1.2), (low quality:1.2), (lowres:1.1), (monochrome:1.1), (greyscale), multiple views, comic, blurry, lowres, bad anatomy, bad hands, missing fingers
